title: Participatory Decision-Making Practice Strategies for Organizational Learning and Employee Empowerment

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning in a BYOD environment enables working professionals to learn flexibly outside of work hours.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three principles for designing participatory decision-making structures within organizations.
Learners can apply practical theories for employee empowerment to develop concrete action plans.
Learners can analyze cases provided in mobile microlearning content to generate feedback on organizational learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
